headline: J.B. Hunt Transport Services, Inc. Announces Participation in Upcoming Investor Conferences
summary: LOWELL, Ark., October 29, 2025--J.B. Hunt Transport Services, Inc. (NASDAQ: JBHT) President and Chief Executive Officer Shelley Simpson, Executive Vice President and President of Intermodal Darren Field and Executive Vice President of Finance and Chief Financial Officer Brad Delco will address the Baird 2025 Global Industrials Conference in Chicago, Illinois at 1:35 pm EST on Tuesday, November 11, 2025.

headline: Do Options Traders Know Something About JBHT Stock We Don't?
summary: Investors need to pay close attention to J.B. Hunt Transport Services stock based on the movements in the options market lately.

headline: Is J.B. Hunt’s (JBHT) New $1 Billion Buyback Shaping Its Capital Allocation Strategy?
summary: J.B. Hunt Transport Services recently announced a quarterly dividend of US$0.44 per share, a new US$1.0 billion share repurchase program, and reported resilient third quarter earnings with net income growth despite slight year-over-year revenue changes. Ongoing share buybacks and stable dividends reflect the company's capital return focus, while operational gains in intermodal and dedicated segments support positive momentum amid broader industry headwinds. We’ll examine how the new...
